description: Returns information about a notebook instance.

parameters.name: NotebookInstanceName
parameters.description: The name of the notebook instance that you want information about.

nested_items.name: NotebookInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the notebook instance.

nested_items.name: NotebookInstanceName
nested_items.description: The name of the SageMaker AI notebook instance.

nested_items.name: NotebookInstanceStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the notebook instance.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: If status is Failed, the reason it failed.

nested_items.name: Url
nested_items.description: The URL that you use to connect to the Jupyter notebook that is running in your notebook instance.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The type of ML compute instance running on the notebook instance.

nested_items.name: SubnetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the VPC subnet.

nested_items.name: SecurityGroups
nested_items.description: The IDs of the VPC security groups.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role associated with the instance.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services KMS key ID SageMaker AI uses to encrypt data when storing it on the ML storage volume attached to the instance.

nested_items.name: NetworkInterfaceId
nested_items.description: The network interface IDs that SageMaker AI created at the time of creating the instance.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp. Use this parameter to retrieve the time when the notebook instance was last modified.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp. Use this parameter to return the time when the notebook instance was created.

nested_items.name: NotebookInstanceLifecycleConfigName
nested_items.description: Returns the name of a notebook instance lifecycle configuration.

nested_items.name: DirectInternetAccess
nested_items.description: Describes whether SageMaker AI provides internet access to the notebook instance. If this value is set to Disabled, the notebook instance does not have internet access, and cannot connect to SageMaker AI training and endpoint services.

nested_items.name: VolumeSizeInGB
nested_items.description: The size, in GB, of the ML storage volume attached to the notebook instance.

nested_items.name: AcceleratorTypes
nested_items.description: This parameter is no longer supported. Elastic Inference (EI) is no longer available.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DefaultCodeRepository
nested_items.description: The Git repository associated with the notebook instance as its default code repository. This can be either the name of a Git repository stored as a resource in your account, or the URL of a Git repository in Amazon Web Services CodeCommit or in any other Git repository. When you open a notebook instance, it opens in the directory that contains this repository. For more information, see Associating Git Repositories with SageMaker AI Notebook Instances.

nested_items.name: AdditionalCodeRepositories
nested_items.description: An array of up to three Git repositories associated with the notebook instance. These can be either the names of Git repositories stored as resources in your account, or the URL of Git repositories in Amazon Web Services CodeCommit or in any other Git repository. These repositories are cloned at the same level as the default repository of your notebook instance. For more information, see Associating Git Repositories with SageMaker AI Notebook Instances.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RootAccess
nested_items.description: Whether root access is enabled or disabled for users of the notebook instance.

nested_items.name: PlatformIdentifier
nested_items.description: The platform identifier of the notebook instance runtime environment.

nested_items.name: InstanceMetadataServiceConfiguration
nested_items.description: Information on the IMDS configuration of the notebook instance.

nested_items.name: MinimumInstanceMetadataServiceVersion
nested_items.description: Indicates the minimum IMDS version that the notebook instance supports. When passed as part of CreateNotebookInstance, if no value is selected, then it defaults to IMDSv1. This means that both IMDSv1 and IMDSv2 are supported. If passed as part of UpdateNotebookInstance, there is no default.
